tip.text: definitely my top 1 choice for vacation right now. Well-planned, delicate landscape design, various activities for all tastes and all group of people. A good place for family or young couples.

venue.name: 古北水镇 Gubei Water Town

tip.text: Chicken and potatoes are all good. The breast is not completely flavored, but the sauce makes up for that. They only offer four seats, which are all out on the street. Takeout is a better choice.
Very famous local chain restaurant. Tangyuan and wonton are its specialties. Not as good as it sounds to be, but can have a try here for breakfast.
Honestly, really amazing stage, good singers and band, spacious space and very competitive price compared to the same standard livehouse in Shanghai. Much better than the bars on old bund in Ningbo.
Typical Chinese sea. Don't know how people swim in the Yellow Sea. The resort charges 60 for entrance fee with some entertainment inside. There are also several seafood restaurants with ocean view.
First seafood restaurant we visited in Shipu. Fresh seafood are offered in several cooking ways. Mud snail is my all-time fav and have a try of their fish noodle. Mixed shells are bad. Don't order.
Everything is in ver big portion. Original flavored fried chicken and mixed vegetables will impress you.
Took us two hours to have a table. Make sure you take your number at least two hours before your planned dining time. Decoration is amazing with decent dishes and fair price. Chicken feet is a must.
Popular dessert shop in Shanghai. Petite size, busy staff and stylish decoration. In the late afternoon, the most popular ones might be sold out. Bowls are good, but soda doesn't worth the price.
Always wanna try their cone, but wanted something more icy, so tried the smoothies. Tiny chocolate chips are well mingled wth the ice. The store opens until midnight. Good place for meetups.
The steam pot is amazing. Seafood is fresh here. They also get many authentic Korean dishes. Price is very reasonable compared to quality. All waiters are Koreans.
If there's no event, the park is free. You can walk by the river and enjoy the sunset. Lupu and Yangpu Bridges are beautiful to watch and it's next to Expo where you have tons of food choices.
Famous for the bund view and its amazing. But the bar is really popular that it's always difficult to find a place to stay up on the roof. Galaxy is a very beautiful cocktail. Girls don't miss it.

formattedAddress: Hyatt on the Bund (at Wuchang Rd)

tip.text: The view is awesome. No matter daytime or evening, Solana will be the perfect restaurant to enjoy the food with an ocean view. Mango shake is also offered here and it's open until midnight.
Quite famous bar near the bund. It does have a good view but you have to book in advance and buy the combo.

formattedAddress: 9F, 27 Zhongshan East Yi Road (Beijing Dong Road)

tip.text: If it's not for the view, I'll not eat at this restaurant. However, it's too hot to sit outdoors.
Famous food market for local food and will offer bbq at night. Many choices with reasonable prices.
Love this hotel so much! Very elegant with a long history. Compared to modern motels, I'd prefer this quiet, delicate hotel, but it's very pricy.
Singapore Sling started here! The bar is in the amazing Raffles hotel. Definitely should come here for a late night drink. Daytime will be too hot to sit in open place.
Many many kinds of flowers are exhibited here. You can also buy plants and necessary fertilizers and tools. Not so crowded on weekends and the ticket is inexpensive. Recommend to go picnic there.

formattedAddress: 1111 Longwu Rd | 龙吴路1111号 (S Longshui Rd)

tip.text: an exotic bar hidden in the Renmin Park. Very popular for the drinks and shisha. First floor is quieter and second floor has a beautiful view outside.

formattedAddress: Inside People's Park, 231 Nanjing Rd. W. (at Huangpi Rd. N.)
location.address: Inside People's Park, 231 Nanjing Rd. W.

tip.text: Very popular restaurant on Yongkang Lu. A small place to hangout with friends. Burger and fried potatoes are so good. Shrimp is also delicious.
The lobster and pasta are amazing. Strongly recommend.

formattedAddress: 323 Hanover St (btwn Prince St & Richmond St)

tip.text: All flavors are good. Meat is special in this region, definitely should try this.
The best restaurant in Changsha. Very special inner design. Crabs and crawfishes are spicy and yummy

venue.name: 文和友老长沙龙虾馆 Old Changsha Crawfish

tip.text: Accidentally ran into this park. Very cheap ticket, but beautiful park to wander or enjoy family life. Ice skating on the lake is fun
Too popular a place. No matter when you go, always 100+ people ahead of you. Better to go in a group of two and tell them you are willing to share the table and you can skip the line.

formattedAddress: 5-2, Bldg 1, Niujie Xili (Near Exit C, Subway Beixinqiao)

tip.text: The exhibition on the 0 meter level is definitely one of my favorite places in Shanghai. Lujiazui area is also worth going.
Very popular place with intimate atmosphere and delicious food
选了这家餐厅吃第二摊，所以没有等位，做法很别致，竹蛏很好吃，毛豆也很意外得好吃
It's a famous live house in Shanghai as many bands are born and discovered here. It has performance almost everyday and alcohol is of ordinary price.
It's on the 87th floor of Grand Hyatt Hotel. Very intimate atmosphere but not very much view up here. Need an entrance fee of 150rmb.

formattedAddress: 87/F, Jin Mao Tower, 88 Century Ave. (at Dongtai Rd.)

tip.text: Dishes are of good value. Always a long queue though
牛蛙面份量好大，光吃牛蛙都吃饱了
Nice bar to enjoy time with friends. Cake is amazing and the staff noodle is the best.

formattedAddress: 兴国路277号 277 XinGuo Lu (（近淮海中路）HuaiHaiZhong Lu)

tip.text: Very popular place for brunch. A bit disappointed of the environment. Nice decoration, but no open area at all. It's a pity for such amiable weather now.
Tried wine with friends there. Good value and nice environment. Pizza pepperoni can never be wrong. LoL.
Friend introduced me. Nice little place for some drinks with friends.

location.crossStreet: Shimen Yi Road | 近石门一路
formattedAddress: 488 Dagu Road | 大沽路488号 (Shimen Yi Road | 近石门一路)

tip.text: Like the patio very much. Soft music with gentle wind. Definitely can enjoy a wonderful night with friends here.
Perfect location. You can enjoy beach, sunshine and even can climb a mountain

venue.name: 國立中山大學 National Sun Yat-Sen University

tip.text: Try the crispy dumpling. It's my favorite among all dumplings.
